MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CollectionChanged As CollectionChangeEventHandler

summary.span: 当集合更改时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the collection changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合更改的示例包括添加或删除的列。Examples of collection changes include additions or removals of columns. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解事件发生的并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑更换与或将消息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`DataGridViewColumnCollection1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridViewColumnCollection1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序相关联事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#372](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#372)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#372](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#372)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn GetFirstColumn(valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates includeFilter) cil managed
Public Function GetFirstColumn (includeFilter As DataGridViewElementStates) As DataGridViewColumn

param.name: includeFilter
param.span: 值的按位组合，表示包含的筛选。

span.span: A bitwise combination of the values that represents the filter for inclusion.

summary.span: 返回符合给定包含筛选要求的显示序列的第一列。

span.span: Returns the first column in display order that meets the given inclusion-filter requirements.

returns.span: 符合给定筛选要求的显示序列中的第一列或 （如果未找到符合要求的列）。

span.span: The first column in display order that meets the given filter requirements, or if no column is found.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 显示序列中的第一列是具有最小列值，而不论在列在屏幕上是否可见。The first column in display order is the column with the lowest value, regardless of whether the column is actually visible on the screen. 此方法可以确定第一个符合给定的条件而无需直接比较索引值的列。This method lets you determine the first column that fits the given criteria without having to compare index values directly. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法来交换的第一个显示的列和最后一个显示的列。The following code example uses the method to swap the first displayed column and the last displayed column. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#170](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CPP/DataGridViewColumnDemo.cpp#170)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#170](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CS/DataGridViewColumnDemo.cs#170)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#170](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/VB/datagridviewcolumndemo.vb#170)]

exception.span: 不是 值的有效按位组合。

span.span: is not a valid bitwise combination of values.

returns.span: 符合给定筛选要求的显示序列中的第一列或 （如果未找到符合要求的列）。

span.span: The first column in display order that meets the given filter requirements, or if no column is found.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 显示序列中的第一列是具有最小列值，而不论在列在屏幕上是否可见。The first column in display order is the column with the lowest value, regardless of whether the column is actually visible on the screen. 此方法可以确定第一个符合给定的条件而无需直接比较索引值的列。This method lets you determine the first column that fits the given criteria without having to compare index values directly.

exception.span: 至少有一个筛选值不是 值的有效按位组合。

span.span: At least one of the filter values is not a valid bitwise combination of values.

param.name: includeFilter

span.span: A bitwise combination of the values that represent the filter to apply for inclusion.

param.name: excludeFilter

summary.span: 返回符合给定筛选要求的显示序列的最后一列。

span.span: Returns the last column in display order that meets the given filter requirements.

returns.span: 符合给定筛选要求的显示序列中的最后一个显示列或 （如果未找到符合要求的列）。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 显示序列中的最后一列是最高列值，而不论在列在屏幕上是否可见。The last column in display order is the column with the highest value, regardless of whether the column is actually visible on the screen. 此方法允许你确定符合给定的条件而无需直接比较索引值的最后一列。This method lets you determine the last column that fits the given criteria without having to compare index values directly. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法来交换显示的最后一列和第一个显示的列。The following code example uses the method to swap the last displayed column and the first displayed column. .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn GetNextColumn(class System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn dataGridViewColumnStart, valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates includeFilter, valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates excludeFilter) cil managed
Public Function GetNextColumn (dataGridViewColumnStart As DataGridViewColumn, includeFilter As DataGridViewElementStates, excludeFilter As DataGridViewElementStates) As DataGridViewColumn

param.name: dataGridViewColumnStart
param.span: 从此列开始搜索下一列。

span.span: The column from which to start searching for the next column.

param.name: includeFilter
param.span: 值的按位组合，表示要申请包含的筛选。

span.span: A bitwise combination of the values that represent the filter to apply for inclusion.

param.name: excludeFilter
param.span: 值的按位组合，表示要申请排除的筛选。

span.span: A bitwise combination of the values that represent the filter to apply for exclusion.

summary.span: 获取符合给定筛选要求的显示序列中给定列后的第一列。

span.span: Gets the first column after the given column in display order that meets the given filter requirements.

returns.span: 符合给定筛选要求的下一列或 （如果未找到符合要求的列）。

span.span: The next column that meets the given filter requirements, or if no column is found.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下一步中的显示顺序列为具有最小的列值高于指定的列，而不论在列在屏幕上是否可见的值。The next column in display order is the column with the lowest value higher than the value of the specified column, regardless of whether the column is actually visible on the screen. 此方法可让你无需直接比较索引值符合给定的条件的当前列后确定下一列。This method lets you determine the next column after the current column that fits the given criteria without having to compare index values directly.

span.span: is .

exception.span: 至少有一个筛选值不是 值的有效按位组合。

span.span: At least one of the filter values is not a valid bitwise combination of values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 显示顺序中的上一列是具有最高的列低于值指定的列，而不论在列在屏幕上是否可见的值。The previous column in display order is the column with the highest value lower than the value of the specified column, regardless of whether the column is actually visible on the screen. 此方法可以确定之前无需直接比较索引值符合给定的条件的当前列的第一列。This method lets you determine the first column before the current column that fits the given criteria without having to compare index values directly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.
